### Built in datasets

```{r, eval=F}
# display the built in dataset, mtcars, by typing the name
# and running this in a code chunk
mtcars

# load the gapminder dataset (contains an example dataset)
library(gapminder)

# show the gapminder dataset
# (contained in the gapminder package)
gapminder
```


### Exploring and checking data

```{r, eval=F}
# show first 6 rows of mtcars
mtcars %>% head()


# shows all columns in happiness plus some data
gapminder %>% glimpse()
```
